name: Neon Collapse
description:
Neon Collapse is a hectic co-op space shooter where you and your friends fight against overwhelming odds to defend your mothership from certain destruction in a chaotic universe. How many waves can you survive?

Features:

  • 1-4 player split screen local co-op survival mode
  • 1-4 player local PVP modes
  • Endless waves of enemies
  • 5 Bosses
  • 2 Mega bosses
  • Ship customization and upgrades
    • 5 Secondary weapons
    • 4 Movement abilities
  • Twin sticks controls
  • Dynamic wrapping universe
  • Intense combat hell
  • Physics based combat 
  • Neon everywhere!

Current build 1.04

Controls: We recommend playing with a controller.

Game-pad:

L-Stick: Move, press fore toggle waypoint

R-Stick: Look, press for laser pointer

RB: Secondary weapon

LT:  Movement ability

Bottom face button/A: Select/open shop

Top face button/Y: Ready up

Left Special button: Stats

Right Special button: Pause

PC:

Turn on in pause menu (Escape to open)

Mouse: Look

Left click:  Shoot

Right Click/Shift: Movement ability

Middle mouse: Secondary ability

E: Select/open shop

Y: Ready up

Tab: Stats

WASD: Move

In shop

X: DMG up

Y: DMG up

B/RightClick: Back

Tips in game:

Spin with zapcannons to do exstra damage!

Hold secondary fire with scatter bolt to charge your shot!

There is no limit to how many drone walls you can have out!

Enemy hp scales depending on how many players are playing!

When close to another player you will connect and your healing rate will double!

Not enough?   See below for what is planned for  update  2.0!

New modes:

 Light racer: Tron inspired pvp mode but with no locked axis's and many abilities to knock people around!  It promises to be the most aggressive game mode of its kind!

New content:

  •   Global Leader boards
  • 1 new Secondary weapon
  • 2 new movement abilities
  • 2 new bosses

Minimum computer specs:

GTX 680 - Graphics card

Intel Core i5-8400

6 GB Ram

2 GB Storage

Supports:

  • Full controller support
  • 1 player mouse and keyboard control
  • 1-4 players
  • Windows 7-10
  • English
